{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Compex |model=WPJ428 |fcc_date=07/20/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=sampling |type=wireless embedded board |fcc_id=TK4WPJ428 |pwr_v=12-24 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4028 |cpu1_cspeed=628 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla2=128 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Micron |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0, Mini PCIe (NGFF), |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, |serial=yes,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4028 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4028 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |eth_chip2_model=QCA8327 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |flags=MU-MIMO, 2x SIM Card slot, |stock_boot=Compex bootloader |stock_os=CompexWRT |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} {{TagLine|802.11ac 2×2 Dual Band Wave 2 Wireless Embedded Board}} :[http://www.compex.com.sg/product/wpj428/ Product page] Get the latest Updates from Compex Systems - [http://eepurl.com/bXB9j5 Link] ===Product Key Features=== *[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4028 @600MHz Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU *256MB RAM (System Memory), 128MB (NAND Flash)/16MB (NOR Flash) *802.11ac compliant & backward compatible with 802.11b/g/n *2x2 On-board 5GHz radio with up to 867Mbps physical data rate *2x2 On-board 2.4GHz radio with up to 300Mbps physical data rate *On-board 2.4GHz max 20dBm output power (per chain) *On-board 5GHz max 17dBm output power (per chain) *2x Gigabit Ethernet LAN RJ45 port with Auto-MDIX *802.3af/at PoE and Passive PoE (range 36-56V) *Dual SIM Card Holder ===Applications=== *802.11n/ac Access Point *Point-to-Point High Capacity Wireless Bridge *Point-to-MultiPoint High Capacity Wireless Bridge *Wireless Customer-Premises Equipment (CPE) *Wireless Base Station ===Purchase Sample=== [http://shop.compex.com.sg/wpj428.html Compex System Sample Store] ====Ordering Configuration==== 
Item Cod      Chipset	               Board Information
WPJ428-TE     IPQ4028    2x2 MU-MIMO 802.11ac 2.4/5GHz SoC radio with NGFF slot
===Models=== :[[Compex]] • [https://www.compex.com.sg/embedded-board/ Embedded Boards] *[[Compex AP-DK01]] (DK01: Malibu) • [http://www.compex.com.sg/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/DK01-v1.5.pdf Datasheet] • [http://us5.campaign-archive2.com/?u=1116d8b46f6d03245b1afb853&id=aee625b526 PR] • [https://www.compex.com.sg/embedded-board/ Page] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4028 @600MHz Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU :128MB RAM (System Memory), 128MB (NAND Flash)/32MB (NOR Flash) :2x2 On-board 2.4/5GHz 802.11ac (Wave 2) radio :5x Gigabit Ethernet LAN (RJ45) port with Auto-MDIX :1x USB 2.0, 1x USB 3.0 Host ports *[[Compex AP-DK03]] (DK03: Dakota) • [http://lists.infradead.org/pipermail/lede-commits/2018-March/006404.html Datasheet] • [https://www.compex.com.sg/embedded-board/ Page] :32 MB of SPI NOR flash (MX25L25635E) :128 MB of SPI NAND flash (GD5F1GQ4UCY1G) :256 MB of RAM :*[[Compex WPJ428]] (DK03: Dakota) *[[Compex AP-DK04]] (DK04: Wasabi) • [https://lists.openwrt.org/pipermail/openwrt-devel/2018-September/013961.html AP-DK07] :*[[Compex WSB419]] (DK04: Wasabi) :*[[Compex WPJ419]] (DK04: Wasabi) ==Images== File:WPJ428 6A01 top.jpg|Main board File:WPJ428-6A02-1-new-450.png|Main board new __NOTOC__
